description: Versatility at its best, the 3-in-1 Powder Town Jacket features H2No® Performance Standard waterproof/breathable protection and a breathable zip-out liner jacket with 60-g FullRange® insulation; the 3-in-1 system can be worn as a shell, light insulation or as a waterproof, insulated jacket. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia 3-in-1 Powder Town Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 2-layer, 3.5-oz 75-denier 100% postconsumer recycled polyester with a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)

specs.key: Outer-shell lining (hood, lower body and powder skirt)
specs.value: 2.2-oz 100% recycled polyester taffeta with a HeiQ® Eco Dry PFC-free DWR finish; (upper body and sleeves) 3.8-oz 100% recycled polyester tricot mesh
2.4-oz 100% polyester (46% recycled) plain weave with stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish
60-g FullRange® 100% polyester (40% recycled) with four-way stretch - Fair Trade Certified™ sewn
Versatile, zip-out, highly breathable insulated jacket features built-in stretch and a smooth, quilted face fabric, and uses lightweight 60-g FullRange® insulation for warmth with less bulk

specs.key: Supporting the People Who Made This Product
specs.value: Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
